sn22.29:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn22.29:1.3: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, ‘aparimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn22.29:1.7: yo viññāṇaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn22.29:1.8: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, ‘aparimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn22.29:1.9: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn22.29:1.10: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, ‘parimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn22.29:1.14: yo viññāṇaṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn22.29:1.15: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, ‘parimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmī”ti.
